content: Head back down the stairs from the waterfall of sand and keep to the right to take down more Spearbones and assorted Rock Guai until you reach an opening in the cliff walls with a small wooden fencing you can break open.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Fright_Cliff_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Fright Cliff Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rockrest Flat'.
The content is as follows:
Head back down the stairs from the waterfall of sand and keep to the right to take down more Spearbones and assorted Rock Guai until you reach an opening in the cliff walls with a small wooden fencing you can break open.
